subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Interscholastic Athletics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: After 50 years at the helm, Vito Montelli, 80, stepped down last year as coach of the St. Joseph High School basketball team in Trumbull, Conn.
snippet: After 50 years at the helm, Vito Montelli, 80, stepped down last year as coach of the St. Joseph High School basketball team in Trumbull, Conn.
